Name: Oaxacan Negroni
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Del Maguey Vida Clásico Mezcal
22.5 ml Mancino Vermouth di Torino Chinato
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
STRAIN into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk of block ice).
Review: Mezcal lends a characterful smoky note to this complex riff on a classic Negroni.
History: Recipe adapted from one created by William Aporih at Añejo Tribeca. William’s original recipe called for ¾ Espolon Reposado mezcal, 1 oz Botanist Gin, ¾ oz Campari, ¾ oz Barolo Chinato and a splash of Cola Nut Extract.
Nutrition: One serving of Oaxacan Negroni contains 226 calories
